id.description: The unique identifier of the media.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the media was last updated.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the media was created.

ad_account_id.description: The unique identifier of the ad account associated with the media.

type.description: The type of media (e.g., image, video).

media_status.description: The status of the media (e.g., active, inactive).

media_usages.description: Items associated with the media usage.

file_name.description: The name of the media file.

download_link.description: The link to download the media file.

duration_in_seconds.description: The duration of the media in seconds.

image_metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the image media.

video_metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the video media.

file_size_in_bytes.description: The file size of the media in bytes.

is_demo_media.description: Indicates if the media is a demo or not.

hash.description: The hash value of the media file for identification purposes.

visibility.description: The visibility settings of the media (e.g., public, private).

name.description: The name or title of the media.
